3. For a linear time invariant system, an optimal controller can be designed if

answers.a: The system is controllable and observable
answers.b: The system is uncontrollable but stable
answers.c: The system is unstable but observable
answers.d: The system is stable but unobservable

answers.a: Increasing the length of the rod
answers.b: Increasing the weight of the bob
answers.c: Reducing the length of the rod
answers.d: Reducing the weight of the bob

questions.question: 6. If a clock, based on oscillating pendulum is taken to the moon, it will

answers.c: Gives same time as on the earth
